elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Manuel still needs pumpkins to prepare dinner. He lives in a growing region and could buy the pumpkins directly from the farm of vegetable grower Sutter. However, he decides to buy the pumpkins from a retailer.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Make a note of the sales channel for the above example.
elements.correctAnswer: Producer (vegetable farmer Sutter) - retail trade - consumer (Manuel)
